name: WebsitePanel Backup File
summary: Learn about .WSPAK files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: WSPAK files are saved in a compressed .ZIP format, so you can view their contents manually with a Zip utility. However, they are typically not decompressed and extracted manually.
NOTE: WebsitePanel only runs on Windows Server (i.e., not Windows Vista, 7, or 8).

description: Backup file created by WebsitePanel, a portal application used for managing Windows Server applications such as IIS, SQL Server, Exchange, and Hyper-V; saves a backup of databases, settings, and other files on the server; can be used for migrating files to a new server; most often used by system administrators.
